children.name: enableDarkness
children.title: Dark
children.tooltip: Enable this to turn this section into a dark section.

children.name: ambient
children.title: Ambient Light
children.tooltip: The color of the darkness, when no light is present.

children.name: shadows
children.title: Shadow Type
children.tooltip: Which type of shadow casting to use (please note that shadows are very resource intensive, and may cause lag).

children.name: falloff
children.title: Falloff Type
children.tooltip: Which type of light falloff to use.

children.name: maxlights
children.title: Maximum Lights
children.tooltip: How many lights can be visible at any one time (you should try and keep this as low as possible, as higher values may cause lag).

children.name: addbright
children.title: Additive Brightness
children.tooltip: If enabled, brightnesses above 1 will create a 'bloom' effect.

children.name: radius
children.title: Radius
children.tooltip: How far the light will spread away from the source.

children.name: brightness
children.title: Brightness
children.tooltip: How bright the light will be.

children.name: weather
children.title: Weather
children.tooltip: Which weather effect (if any) should be visible in this section.

children.name: screenEffects
children.title: Screen Effects
children.tooltip: Which full screen effect (if any) should apply in this section.

children.name: enabled
children.title: Enabled
children.tooltip: When checked, the beat timer will be overwritten with these settings when entering this section.

children.name: bpm
children.title: BPM
children.tooltip: How fast the beat should be in Beats Per Minute.

children.name: useMusicClock
children.title: Use Music Clock
children.tooltip: When checked, the beat timer will be synchronised to the music clock. Otherwise, it will just tick along with game time.

children.name: timeSignature
children.title: Time Signature
children.tooltip: The number of beats per bar (some events will occur once per bar).
